knimeNode.name: PDB Describe Heterogens
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to retrieve Heterogen details from the 'PDB Describe Chemical Components' webservice.

intro.p:
This node uses the PDB ( www.rcsb.org ) "
Describe Chemical Components
" webservice to provide details of chemical components ("heterogens") identified by their 1 - 3 character PDB Het ID. The service does not provide results for standard proteinergic L-amino acids.
The PDB Describe Heterogens node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

tab.name: Search Options
tab.option: Select a string column containing the 1 - 3 Character heterogen IDs. The querying is case-insensitive.

Add the heterogen type - e.g. 'D-peptide linking', 'non-polymer' etc. NB Standard amino acid residues, e.g. SER are not returned by this service, but modified and non-standard residues, e.g. SEP are returned.

tab.name: Connection Properties
tab.option: The maximum length of the URL submitted to the GET webservice (2000 - 8000 characters). Higher values will result in fewer calls to the service, but may be blocked by proxy servers.

ports.inPort: Input table containing a column of PDB Heterogen IDs
ports.outPort: The input table, with selected heterogen information added
